Title: Chevron shuts Wheatstone LNG plant for repairs
Description: Chevron Australia has suspended production at its 8.9 mtpa Wheatstone plant in Western Australia to repair its offshore infrastructure for an unspecified amount of time.
Author: JS

Title: FERC orders Venture Global to release documents on Calcasieu Pass LNG start-up delay
Description: The Federal Energy Regulatory Commission (FERC) has ordered LNG project developer Venture Global to provide its term customers with documents regarding the mechanical problems which are delaying the commercial start-up of its 10 mtpa Calcasieu Pass LNG plant in Louisiana.
Author: JS

Title: NNPC, Golar aim for FID on Nigerian FLNG project this year
Description: State-owned Nigerian National Petroleum Corp (NNPC) and Bermuda-headquartered LNG infrastructure player Golar LNG aim to make a final investment decision (FID) on a floating LNG plant in the Niger Delta by the end of 2024.
Author: JS
